A friend suggested this place for tapas so my last day in Barcelona I decided to try it and am I glad I did. I love the atmosphere and the food here. Visually the tapas are very appealing and the flavors are subtle but delicious. Instead of using baguettes they use small little pancakes and the combination of slightly sweet with the savory works. My favorite was the chocolate filled churro with caramel drizzle and orange chocolate shavings.....I had 2.
